title: The Chronicles of Jasper and Gary
description: Gary is hopeful that nightly expeditions with his theatrical friend Jasper will introduce him to a more adventurous class of girl. They do. He also meets anarchy, folly and mayhem – and extra-ordinary shoes. “Mr Garcia waves his literary wand to take us on a roller coaster ride, where traditional desires are nudged to their limits with hilarious results. “ SmackFiction Reviews
author: Emanuel E. Garcia
